author: Municipal Meerkat
text:
Greetings! Softball season is almost upon us, and my colleagues and I at ICMA are looking forward to fielding a team this year. First things first though, we need a team name. As the captain of the team, I thought I would see if the Knowledge Network community would be willing to help us out by suggesting a new (perhaps local government themed) softball team name.
I can't wait to see what you all come up with!
title: ICMA Softball
